Name: Little Smith
Ingredients: 25 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of dehydrated apple slice.
Garnish with dehydrated apple slice floated on cocktail.
Review: Lightly spicy and delicately fragrant with a faint grassiness.
History: Discovered in 2011 at Ubar, Copenhagen, Denmark.
